name: GravityGolf (Prototype)
description:
In "GravityGolf" your challenge is to direct the ball in to the goal... with the power of GravityPoints, which can attract the ball or push it away

  • Grigory Gusev - Game Design, Game Art
  • Nino Brugger - Game Programing, Game Design
  • Kleo Kreitz - Game Ar

Controls:

  • Left Mouseclick: negative Gravityfield
  • Right Mouseclick: positive Gravityfield
  • Space: Start Level (speed goes up and down, press Space again to hit the ball)
